name: Enigmatic (Thomas Jacobs)
description:
Enigmatic is a short-lived concept game that is built around the fundamentals of providing a cryptic and engaging design to create a captivating experience.

The puzzle is relatively simple in this first level once you test and therefore, learn the mechanics of the level. Depending on whether anyone actually enjoys the concept; the idea of enigmatic is to release a variety of new puzzles and mechanics every few weeks.

Thanks for playing!

T.
